param.description: locallyPredictive -- Identify locally predictive attributes. Iteratively adds attributes with the highest correlation with the class as long as there is not already an attribute in the subset that has a higher correlation with the attribute in question
missingSeparate -- Treat missing as a separate value. Otherwise, counts for missing values are distributed across other values in proportion to their frequency.
Direction: Set the direction of the search.
searchTermination -- Set the amount of backtracking.
startSet -- Set the start point for the search. This is specified as a comma seperated list off attribute indexes starting at 1. It can include ranges. Eg. 1,2,5-9,17.
numToSelect -- Specify the number of attributes to retain. The default value (-1) indicates that all attributes are to be retained. Use either this option or a threshold to reduce the attribute set.
startSet -- Set the start point for the search. This is specified as a comma seperated list off attribute indexes starting at 1. It can include ranges. Eg. 1,2,5-9,17.
threshold -- Set threshold by which attributes can be discarded. Default value results in no attributes being discarded. Use either this option or numToSelect to reduce the attribute set.
